definition.description: Power Supply Position - Region level (Northern, Western, Southern, Eastern and North-Eastern) Daily energy summary and National level (India) Daily energy summary

RegionID.description: Identifier/foreign key field for RegionID. Contains values 1 to 5 for Northern, Southern, Western, Eastern and North-Eastern regions respectively and value 6 for India.

EveningPeakDemandMet.description: Maximum power demand met or peak demand met in the evening measured specifically at 20:00 hours (MW)

PeakShortage.description: Maximum power demand shortage or peak shortage during the evening measured specifically at 20:00 hours (MW)

EnergyMet.description: Energy Demand met for the region for the day's 24 hour period (MU)

EnergyShortage.description: Energy shortage ( energy demand not met) in the region for the day's 24 hour period (MU)

MaxDemandSCADA.description: Maximum power demand measured by SCADA in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

TimeOfMaxDemandMet.description: Time of maximum power demand measured by SCADA in the day's 24 hour period (HH:MM)

ScheduleDrawal.description: Energy Scheduled to be drawn (scheduled energy) by the region for the day's 24 hour period. Positive value if drawing energy from inter state transmission system (ISTS) and negative value for adding energy to ISTS (MU)

ActualDrawal.description: Energy Actually drawn (actual energy) by the region for the day's 24 hour period (MU). Positive value if drawing energy from inter state transmission system (ISTS) and negative value for adding energy to ISTS (MU)

OverUnderDrawal.description: Energy Over drawn (positive) or under drawn (negative) by the region from inter state transmission system (ISTS) compared to its drawal schedule. The region's actual drawal is the sum of ScheduleDrawal and OverUnderDrawal (MU)

CentralSectorOutage.description: Power capacity under outage for the Generating Utilities owned by Central Sector (MW)

StateSectorOutage.description: Power capacity under outage for the Generating Utilities owned by State Sector (MW)

TotalOutage.description: Power capacity under outage for the Generating Utilities owned by both Central and State Sectors (MW)

ShareRESInTotalGeneration.description: Share of renewable energy sources in total generation (%)

ShareNonFossilInTotalGeneration.description: Share of Non-fossil fuel (Hydro, Nuclear and Renewable) sources in total generation (%)

DurationFrequencyBelow49_7.description: Duration when system frequency was below 49.7 Hz (%)

DurationFrequency_49_7_to_49_8.description: Duration when system frequency was between 49.7 and 49.8 Hz (%)

DurationFrequency_49_8_to_49_9.description: Duration when system frequency was between 49.8 and 49.9 Hz (%)

DurationFrequencyBelow49_9.description: Duration when system frequency was below 49.9 Hz (%)

DurationFrequency_49_9_to_50_05.description: Duration when system frequency was between 49.9 and 50.05 Hz (%)

DurationFrequencyAbove50_05.description: Duration when system frequency was above 50.05 Hz (%)

RegionDDF.description: Regions Demand Diversity Factor (R-DDF) - Ratio of Sum of regional maximum demands and All India Maximum Demand (%)

StatesDDF.description: States Demand Diversity Factor (S-DDF) - Ratio of Sum of states maximum demands and All India Maximum Demand (%)

SolarHRMaxDemand.description: Maximum power demand during solar hours 06:00 to 18:00 (MW)

SolarHRMaxDemandTime.description: Time of maximum demand during solar hours 06:00 to 18:00 (HH:MM)

SolarHRShortage.description: Power Demand shortage at the time of Solar Hour Maximum Demand during solar hours 06:00 to 18:00 (MW)

NonSolarHRMaxDemand.description: Maximum power demand during non-solar hours 18:00 to 06:00 (MW)

NonSolarHRMaxDemandTime.description: Time of maximum demand during non-solar hours 18:00 to 06:00 (HH:MM)

NonSolarHRShortage.description: Power Demand shortage at the time of Non-Solar Hour Maximum Demand during non-solar hours 18:00 to 06:00 (MW)

definition.description: Power Supply Position - State level Daily energy summary

StateID.description: State identifier having foreign key reference to DimStates table

MaximumDemand.description: Maximum Power Demand of the state in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

Shortage.description: Power Shortage at the Maximum Power Demand of the state in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

EnergyMet.description: Energy Demand met for the state in the day's 24 hour period (MU)

DrawalSchedule.description: Energy scheduled by the state to be drawn from the Inter State Transmission System (ISTS). This is the energy expected to be required by the state apart from its own generation. Positive value if drawing energy from ISTS and negative value if adding energy to ISTS (MU)

OverUnderDrawal.description: Energy Over drawn (positive) or under drawn (negative) by the state from inter state transmission system (ISTS) compared to its drawal schedule. The state's actual drawal is the sum of DrawalSchedule and OverUnderDrawal (MU)

MaxOverDrawal.description: Maximum power over drawn by the state from inter state transmission system (ISTS) in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

EnergyShortage.description: Energy shortage (demand not met) in the state for the day's 24 hour period (MU)

definition.description: Region level Daily energy generation by source type (Hydro, Nuclear, Thermal, Solar, Wind, etc.)

RegionID.description: Identifier/foreign key field for RegionID having reference to DimRegions table. Contains values 1 to 5 for Northern, Western, Southern, Eastern and North-Eastern regions respectively and value 6 for India.

GenerationSourceID.description: Identifier/foreign key field for GenerationSourceID having reference to DimGenerationSources table.

GenerationAmount.description: Energy generated by the source during the day's 24 hour period (MU)

metadata.business_name: Region and India level Generation Source Energy Breakdown
Region and India level Generation Source Energy Breakdown

CountryID.description: Identifier/primary key field for the Country

CountryName.description: Name of the country involved in power exchange. Total Import, Total Export and Total Net are also added as countries

DateID.description: Identifer/primary key field for the Date reference of the record

ActualDate.description: Date reference for the record in the format YYYY-MM-DD

DayOfWeek.description: Day of the week for the date. Values are Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday and Sunday.

DayOfMonth.description: Day of the month for the date. Values are 1 to 31.

Month.description: Month of the year for the date. Values are 1 to 12.

Quarter.description: Quarter number of the calendar year for the date. Values are 1 to 4.

MechanismID.description: Identifier/primary key field of the Exchange Mechanism for trading energy

MechanismName.description: Name of the exchange mechanism used for energy trading

GenerationSourceID.description: Identifier/primary key field of the Generation Source

SourceName.description: Name of the generation source (e.g., Solar, Wind, Hydro, Thermal)

RegionID.description: Identifier/primary key field for the Region. Contains values 1 to 5 for Northern, Western, Southern, Eastern and North-Eastern regions respectively and value 6 for India. All regions belong to India.

DateID.description: Foreign Key Date reference for the record

StateID.description: Primary key identifier of the state

StateName.description: Name of the state in India

RegionID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimRegions table for the Region to which the Indian state belongs to

LineID.description: Identifier/primary key field for Transmission Line

LineIdentifier.description: Identifier/name of the transmission link or transmission line

VoltageLevel_kV.description: Voltage Level in kilo Volts of the Transmission line

NumberOfCircuits.description: Number Of Circuits available for the Transmission Line

CountryID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference for the Country if the transmission line is an international transmission line

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

CountryID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimCountries table for the Country

TotalEnergyExchanged.description: Energy imported from the country to India. Positive value if importing energy and negative value if exporting energy (MU)

PeakExchange.description: Maximum Power Import observed from the country to India. Positive value if importing power and negative value if exporting power (MW)

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

LineID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimTransmissionLines table for the Transmission Line

CountryID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimCountries table for the country from which India is importing

RegionID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimRegions table for the region in India to which transmission line is connected

MaxLoading.description: Maximum Power load observed on the international link. Positive value if importing power and negative value if exporting power (MW)

MinLoading.description: Minimum power load observed on the international link. Positive value if importing power and negative value if exporting power (MW)

AvgLoading.description: Average power load observed on the international link. Positive value if importing power and negative value if exporting power (MW)

EnergyExchanged.description: Total energy exchanged across the international link during the day's 24 hour period. Positive value if importing energy and negative value if exporting energy (MU)

definition.description: International Transmission Line Flow data showing the import information from the neighboring countries to India

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

BlockTime.description: Starting Timestamp of the 15-minute time block in the format HH:MM

BlockNumber.description: Ordinal index of the time block within the day. Values are 1 to 96 for 15-minute time blocks.

GenerationSourceID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimGenerationSources table for the Generation Source

GenerationOutput.description: Generating Power output by the generation source in the time block (MW)

definition.description: Generating power data for each generation source for each 15-minute time block during the day

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

BlockTime.description: Starting Timestamp of the 15-minute time block in the format HH:MM

BlockNumber.description: Ordinal index of the time block within the day. Values are 1 to 96 for 15-minute time blocks.

Frequency.description: Power System grid frequency in the time block (Hz)

DemandMet.description: Total Power demand met in the time block (MW)

NetDemandMet.description: Net power demand met in the time block. Net Demand is the difference between the total power demand met and the sum of generating powers of Solar and Wind in the time block (MW)

TotalGeneration.description: Total generating power of all the generation sources in the time block (MW)

NetTransnationalExchange.description: Net transnational exchange in the time block. Positive value if importing power and negative value if exporting power (MW)

definition.description: Power System data for Power Demand and Generating power supply utilized for each 15-minute time block during the day

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

LineID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimTransmissionLines table for the Transmission Line

Inter_Region.description: Region1 to Region2 connection for the Transmission Line. eg., ER-NR, ER-WR, etc.

MaxImport.description: Maximum power import by region1 from region2 of Inter_Region observed on the line in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

MaxExport.description: Maximum power export by region1 to region2 of Inter_Region on the line in the day's 24 hour period (MW)

ImportEnergy.description: Total energy imported by region1 from region2 of Inter_Region on the line in the day's 24 hour period (MU)

ExportEnergy.description: Total energy exported by region1 to region2 of Inter_Region on the line in the day's 24 hour period (MU)

NetImportEnergy.description: Net energy imported by region1 from region2 of Inter_Region on the line in the day's 24 hour period. Positive value if importing energy and negative value if exporting energy (MU)

definition.description: Transmission Line Flow data showing the import and export information for each region to region connection for the day's 24 hour period

DateID.description: Foreign key reference to DimDates table for the Date

CountryID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimCountries table for the Country

MechanismID.description: Identifier/foreign key reference to DimExchangeMechanisms table for the Exchange Mechanism used for the energy trading

ExchangeDirection.description: Direction of the energy exchange from India. Export from India, Import to India, Net Export from India

definition.description: Transnational Trading mechanism and Exchange data showing the import and export information for each country to India for the day's 24 hour period

relationships.business_meaning: Each daily summary belongs to a specific region
Each state energy record belongs to a specific state
Each generation record belongs to a specific source type
Each generation record belongs to a specific state
